text: Arthur Owen Barfield (9 November 1898 – 14 December 1997) was a British philosopher, author, poet and critic. He was a member of the Inklings. He was known for his philosophy collection Saving the Appearances. ==Other websites== * Owen Barfield Literary Estate – permissions, publications, academic research on Owen Barfield * Journal of Inklings Studies peer-reviewed journal on Barfield and his literary circle, based in Oxford * The Owen Barfield Society * Owen Barfield website * The Marion E.
